description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the Delivery History screen in a delivery application. It includes a main screen class `DeliveryHistoryScreen`, a header widget `_Header`, and a row widget `_Row` used to display placeholder content relevant to the delivery history feature, with role-based access control.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the delivery history page with role-based access control and placeholder content.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget for displaying the header section of the delivery history page, styled with a gradient and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A stateless widget for rendering individual rows of placeholder content within the delivery history page.

methods.name: build (DeliveryHistoryScreen)
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the delivery history screen, including app bar and body with role-based content rendering.

methods.name: build (_Header)
methods.description: Builds the header widget with gradient background, icon, and title.

methods.name: build (_Row)
methods.description: Builds a styled row widget displaying text with an icon.
